typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	folderTxtFiles as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	fileList: true,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'outputblob',
	folderPath: (bc6f661b-7bde-4694-b632-9c01e374d33c),
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	encodingName: 'WINDOWS-1251',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> sourceOfTxt
sourceOfTxt derive(each(match(name == 'END_QNTY'), $$ = toFloat($$))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1
